attributes.action: Free mental disability testing for anyone through the NHS
attributes.background: It is hard for the parents or people who don't have jobs to pay for the testing for there children or them selves. This petitions will make free mental disability test free for anyone in the UK.

rejection.details: Treatment on the NHS is free for UK residents at the point of delivery.  We're not sure what kind of testing you would like to be provided by the NHS. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government to do.
